author: Garrey Dawson
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Heat the oil in an ovenproof pan and gently fry the swede, potato, garlic and herbs for 6-8 minutes, stirring regularly.  Add the broccoli florets, season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper, then transfer to the oven to cook for a further 8-10 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil,  ½ small swede, peeled and cut into small cubes,  ½ baking potato, peeled and cut into small cubes,  2 garlic cloves, peeled, chopped,  sprig fresh rosemary,  3 sprigs fresh thyme,  handful broccoli florets,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
